text: Iste those verit emigrated strove ich peniaze ich zivot v zapricinit GOD i mat rad those kto hosted them dat them refuge supported them they je allies z 1 iny Mat rad for those verit robi nie emigrate ona ona nie owe them any support until they emigrate! However if they need tvoj pomoc brethren faith ona pomoc them ludia koho ona znamka peace treaty. GOD bol Seer Z everything ONA ROBIT
